root.name: Bilspel
root.description: Using color ANSI graphics, where your car is simply depicted as a dash, you have to race through a series of circuits (six in total) with increasing difficulty (and varying numbers of laps) without hitting the circuit walls.The game is entirely in Swedish and was made for the NiKOM BBS software, which was one of the most popular BBS programs for the Amiga in Sweden throughout the 90's.
